title: "Export documentation"

---

Learn how to export a model documentation project in Word or PDF formats. This topic is relevant for both model developers and model validators who need to export the model documentation or validation report files outside the ValidMind Platform. 

## Prerequisites

* You are a registered user on the ValidMind Platform
* The model is already [registered in the model inventory](register-models.qmd)
* A model document project is completed or in progress
* You are logged into the ValidMind Platform


## Export Model Documentation

1. Navigate to the relevant Documentation project

2. Click "Documentation" on the left-hand sidebar to virew the model documentation table of contents

3. In the table of content sidebar, click on "Export"

4. Configure the export options
   - Check "Include comment threads" to include comment threads into the exported file
   - Check "Section activity logs" to include a history of changes in each section of the documentation
   - Choose the file format for export. We currently support export to .docx (Microsoft Word 2007 and newer), and .pdf  

5. Click "Download file" to download the file locally on your machine

## Export Validation Report

1. Navigate to the relevant Documentation project

2. Click "Validation Report" on the left-hand sidebar to virew the model documentation table of contents

3. In the table of content sidebar, click on "Export"

4. Configure the export options
   - Check "Include comment threads" to include comment threads into the exported file
   - Check "Section activity logs" to include a history of changes in each section of the documentation
   - Choose the file format for export. We currently support export to .docx (Microsoft Word 2007 and newer), and .pdf  

5. Click "Download file" to download the file locally on your machine
